September is Suicide Prevention Awareness Month. To anyone who is struggling: please know that you are not alone.

To reach the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline, please call 1-800-273-8255.
Heartbreaking. Our firefighters risk everything to keep our communities safe. Keeping their family and loved ones in my thoughts. https://www.sacbee.com/news/california/fires/article245403670.html

As evacuation orders are lifted for the California wildfires, it’s important to check for hazards when returning to your home. Be sure to take all precautions and stay safe. https://twitter.com/CAgovernor/status/1300508085987860480 QT @CAgovernor Be cautious when returning home after a wildfire. ⚠️🏠

Even if evacuation orders have been lifted, dangers can remain.

Be aware of your surroundings and visit http://readyforwildfire.org to review @CAL_FIRE's safety checklist. 📋

Rent is due today.

Millions of Americans are unable to pay their bills because Congress has failed to bring adequate relief in the midst of this pandemic—it’s shameful. The American people need relief now.

In past Administrations, we would come together as patriots on matters of national security. 

The vandalism of our democracy by this Administration is unprecedented. The American people will come together again as patriots to root it out with our votes – 63 days to Nov. 3rd. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1300941767408324609/pu/img/7LWYF8cGKyl1sVRf.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1300941767408324609/pu/vid/480x270/4cv3cVYjmh7P4hDf.mp4?tag=10

It's past time for Republicans to get off pause against the #coronavirus. It's not going away on its own, allowing it to kill millions is *not* an option, and our economy is still reeling from a body blow that requires more relief. 

Families are suffering and rent is due.

When the President works to keep information away from the Congress that he is obligated by law to provide, he is keeping information that belongs to the American people from the American people.

#AllRoadsLeadToPutin with Trump. He’s doubling down on hiding Russia’s tracks, now. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1300811673348046851/pu/img/sumIWGEvTU3rlp6D.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1300811673348046851/pu/vid/480x270/baaJL6X7kyc9jVXX.mp4?tag=10

Today rent is due for millions of Americans who have struggled to pay their bills during this pandemic—and many  face eviction. Congress passed eviction protection in the last #COVID19 relief package but it recently expired—Congress must address this now. https://www.nytimes.com/2020/08/29/opinion/sunday/coronavirus-evictions-superspreader.html?smtyp=cur&smid=tw-nytopinion

-Eliminate millions of jobs
-Increase household energy costs by billions

FACT CHECK: "Biden has repeatedly promised to 'get rid of fossil fuels' and even said he would 'love to' get rid of fracking entirely"

-Destroy millions of jobs
-Raise gas prices
-Weaken America's energy independence https://freebeacon.com/2020-election/kamala-harris-has-endorsed-complete-fracking-ban/

Over 6 million people in the U.S. have contracted COVID-19 & 180,000 have died. Instead of expanding testing, PPE, & contact tracing, Donald Trump spread conspiracy theories & lies. Donald Trump might call this a "good job." I call it a needless tragedy. https://www.cbsnews.com/news/coronavirus-united-states-6-million-cases/
You ran a strong campaign that inspired many, @JoeKennedy. I know your righteous fights are far from over.

Congratulations, @EdMarkey! I’m excited to continue fighting alongside you in the Senate, where we need your bold leadership more than ever. https://twitter.com/EdMarkey/status/1300992956422410246 QT @EdMarkey Tonight is more than just a celebration of an election, it is a celebration of a movement. Thank you to the thousands of grassroots supporters who organized around the principles that we believe in. We could not have done it without you. https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1OwxWLMVrNQKQ

You can help protect our democracy and make sure our elections run smoothly as a paid poll worker or election judge, and it's easy to sign up.

Many who feel safe doing so are stepping up to serve for the first time—join them! https://www.powerthepolls.org/

By electing Democrats up and down the ballot, we have a chance to choose compassion over cruelty, empathy over ego, facts over fear, and hope over hate.

Not just in the White House, but in the halls of Congress, in state legislatures, and in local offices across the country.

As the daughter of an ironworker, @LoriTrahanMA knows how important it is to fight for working families. We can count on her to keep working for good jobs, strong unions, health care, Social Security, and to make sure everyone gets a fighting chance at the American dream.

.@AyannaPressley is a dear friend and partner in the fight for racial and economic justice. She's worked tirelessly for those who have been left out and left behind, and her bold, principled leadership is more important than ever. Her voice is truly indispensable in Congress.

.@EdMarkey knows firsthand the needs of working-class families and has been a champion for them in the Senate. And as an author of the #GreenNewDeal, he's fighting for clean energy jobs and environmental justice. It's been an honor to support my friend and partner in the Senate.

It’s Election Day in Massachusetts, and I couldn’t be prouder of these bold leaders—partners in the fight for big, structural change in our state and across the country.

If you haven't already, I hope you'll get out there and safely vote for them today: http://IWillVote.com

But there’s no question that the economic proposals Joe Biden is supporting are strong and will go a long, long way in improving life for working families. We must elect him and throw Trump out of office. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1300874714127183872/img/H4mimirygg6h1EvV.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1300874714127183872/vid/320x320/mpPU2RIKkMBEVRDe.mp4?tag=13

The mainstream media doesn't talk about it.

Congress doesn't talk about it.

Trump doesn't talk about it.

But three multi-billionaires now own more wealth than the bottom half of our society.

That level of inequality is immoral and unsustainable.

In the richest country on Earth no one should suddenly lose their health insurance, let alone during a pandemic. It's outrageous that our corporate-run system treats health insurance as an employee benefit, not a right. We must end that disgrace and pass Medicare for All. https://twitter.com/EconomicPolicy/status/1298686169379676161 QT @EconomicPolicy New EPI research from @joshbivens_DC and @benzipperer  finds that about 12 million people have likely lost employer-sponsored health insurance since February.
